Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
Whenever Diabolical Doctor attacks, roll a d6. Diabolical Doctor gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X half of the result, rounded up.
notes:
Whenever you roll an odd number, do effect.
1, T, Something that relates to effect: Roll a d6.
